member.name: CMSG_CTRL_ADD_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR_PARA
member.summary: The CMSG_CTRL_ADD_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR_PARA structure is used to add an unauthenticated attribute to a signer of a signed message. This structure is passed to if the dwCtrlType parameter is set to CMSG_CTRL_ADD_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_ADD_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR_PARA.cbSize
member.summary: Size of this structure in bytes.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_ADD_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR_PARA.dwSignerIndex
member.summary: Index of the signer in the rgSigners array of pointers of structures in a signed message's structure. The unauthenticated attribute is to be added to this signer's information.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_ADD_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR_PARA.BLOB
member.summary: A CRYPT_DATA_BLOB structure that contains the encoded unauthenticated attribute as its pbData member.
